name: Robert Sandell
tagline: Software Engineering, The World and Me
body:
## About
I am a software engineer with a focus on integration and development of software development tools, mostly Java related.

I started my tools career in the Java R&D department at Sony Ericsson _(now [Sony Mobile](http://www.sonymobile.com/))_ int the team that developed and maintained the J2ME SDK. Got bitten by the [JUnit](http://junit.org/) bug and moved on to more quality and auto testing related tools.

Now I am the lead engineer for the [CI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Continuous_integration) system based on [Jenkins](http://jenkins-ci.org/) used by the Software R&D Organisation at [Sony Mobile](http://www.sonymobile.com/).

I made my first contribution to the Jenkins Community in 2010 with the [Gerrit Trigger Plugin](https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Gerrit+Trigger) and have since then considered that community my home.
